entry.title: Raw Moringa Leaf Powder Capsules (Pure, Vegan & Organic) | Moringa Life
entry.summary:
Vendor: Moringa Life
Type: Supplements
Price: 126.50

Moringa Life's Raw Moringa Leaf Powder Capsules (120 vegan caps) is a potent, concentrated all-round healer for optimal health, and prevention and treatment of illness.

  • Moringa Oleifera is widely used as a super food for its high nutritional value, with a higher concentration of vitamins and minerals than most other plants
  • Contains 92 nutrients, 46 antioxidants, 36 anti-inflammatories, 18 amino acids, 9 essential amino acids
  • Contains 2 x more protein than yoghurt, 3 x more potassium than bananas, 4 x more calcium than milk, 4 x more Vitamin A than carrots, 7 x more Vitamin C than oranges
  • Used for "tired blood" (anemia), arthritis and other joint pain, asthma, cancer, constipation, diabetes, diarrhea, epilepsy, stomach pain, ulcers, intestinal spasms, headaches, heart problems, high blood pressure, kidney stones, fluid retention, thyroid problems, bacterial infections, fungal infections, viral infections, parasitic infections and muscle recovery
  • Moringa is also used to reduce swelling, boost the immune system, increase breastmilk production, reduce inflammation, and increase mental alertness
  • No negative side effects associated with Moringa Oleifera use
  • 100% vegan, soy-free, 100% organic, non-GMO, 100% natural (no additives), gluten-free and dairy-free!

Ingredients

Moringa Leaf Powder in vegan capsule

The benefits of continuous intake of Moringa

  • Increases the natural defences of the body
  • Provides nourishment to the eyes and the brain
  • Promotes metabolism with bio-available ingredients
  • Promotes the cell structure of the body
  • Promotes natural serum cholesterol
  • Promotes the normal functioning of the liver and the kidney
  • Promotes energy
  • Promotes proper digestion
  • Acts as an antioxidant
  • Takes care of the immune system of the body
  • Promotes healthy circulatory system
  • It is an anti-inflammatory
  • Gives a feeling of general wellness
  • Supports the normal sugar levels of the body
  • Promotes good sleep
  • Encourages soft, clear skin

entry.title: Baltic Amber Necklace for ADHD Children
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baltic Amber for Africa
Type: ADHD
Price: 190.00

Baltic Amber for Africa's ADHD Necklace aids concentration and inner-peace in people who suffer from Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD).

  • This amber and gemstone necklace aids concentration and brings a sense of inner calm and groundedness
  • The crystals also ease other difficulties which may be associated with ADHD such as anxiety, depression, upset or anger
  • Carefully crafted using Cognac Amber, Smokey Quartz, Sodalite and Fluorite
  • Smokey Quartz helps you to feel grounded and is beneficial in times of stress. Smokey quartz helps to instill feelings of calmness and aids in releasing fear, especially when this is linked to failure. The grounding properties of this stone help ease hyperactivity and staying on task.
  • Sodalite helps to clear mental confusion and restore inner peace that has been disrupted. It encourages effective communication and calms the mind, increasing it’s ability to take in and process new information and focus.
  • Fluorite is said to absorb and neutralize all negative energies and is also known as the “Genius Stone,” as it increases concentration and helps in decision-making. Fluorite clears your mind of confusion, cluttered
    thoughts and negativity. Fluorite heightens mental abilities, assisting in rapid organisation and processing of information.
  • Design feature to protect against choking if the necklace is pulled hard
  • As an additional safety feature, there is a knot before and after each bead so that in the event of it being broken, there is no risk of choking on the beads
  • Circumference size: 36 cm

How can an amber necklace help those with ADHD?

Baltic amber has been used for thousands of years for its beauty and healing properties. Although the exact process is unclear of how Baltic Amber is therapeutic, it is thought that when Baltic amber warms against the skin, it creates an electromagnetic field and releases succinic acid, a natural healing oil that aids against inflammation, discomfort and pain. This makes Baltic amber the perfect natural solution to help those struggling with ADHD!

Ancient people believed that Baltic amber would give courage to the wearer, ward off evil spirits, protect against disease, strengthen the human spirit and purify the soul. To this day Baltic amber is believed to have spiritual properties that provide psychic protection and aid manifestations.

Baltic amber is also referred to as an Adaptogen, which aids in the body's ability to deal with changes in the environment and stress. 

Directions for use

The necklace is worn around your neck and the beads are NOT for chewing and sucking! The healing and stress relieving process takes place when the amber beads warm against your skin.

Do not use harsh detergents on your Baltic amber ADHD necklace. Simply rinse with warm water to clean and dry with a soft dry cloth. You can also rub the beads with a little olive oil to restore shine if needed. 

Please note: Due to the nature of this product, each amber necklace is slightly different - no two are exactly the same!

entry.title: PureCalm - Natural remedy soothes anxiety, stress & reduces panic attacks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

PureCalm is a natural herbal remedy, developed by a Clinical Psychologist, to soothe the symptoms of anxiety, stress and panic attacks. It offers fast on-the-spot relief when needed. (50 ml)

  • Formulated by a Clinical Psychologist
  • Helps with nervous stress & tension
  • Calms & reduces anxiety and panic attacks
  • Soothes the nerves
  • Reduces symptoms of OCD
  • Excellent companion remedy to MindSoothe Capsules

Ingredients

PureCalm is formulated according to the principles of Whole Herb Technology, staying true to the Full Spectrum manufacturing principles of herbal medicine. The 100% natural herbal ingredients of PureCalm are: 

    Melissa officinalis (Lemon Balm), Lavandula augustifolia (Lavender), 
    Passiflora incarnata (Passion Flower), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    PureCalm comes in convenient concentrated tincture (drop) form and is diluted in water or juice. 

    Dosage:

    Adults: Dilute 15 drops in about 1/4 cup water or juice three times daily or when needed.

    Children over 6 years: One drop per age year of the child

    Caution: Safety during pregnancy and breastfeeding has not been established. Please consult your doctor should symptoms persist

          Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: MindSoothe Jr - Effective natural herbal mood tonic for children
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

MindSoothe Jr is an all-herbal natural treatment for depression, anxiety and mood disorders in children and is formulated by a practising Clinical Psychologist. Individual ingredients are well-researched and have been specially chosen for their high safety profile in childrens’ remedies.

  • Acts as a natural anti-depressant and mood tonic for chldren
  • Reduces anger, mood swings and oppositional behavior
  • Helps to optimize levels of neurotransmitters like dopamine and serotonin, often implicated in some of the secondary symptoms of autism, Spectrum Disorders and PDD
  • Reduces anxiety and symptoms of childhood OCD
  • Easy to administer drop formulation is added to water or juice

Ingredients

MindSoothe Jr contains the following ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: ﻿

Hypericum perforatum (St John's Wort), Passiflora incarnata, Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

MindSoothe Jr comes in convenient concentrated tincture (drop) form and is diluted in water or juice. 

Dosage:
One drop per age year of the child twice daily - diluted in about 1/4 cup water or juice.

Note: As with prescription anti-depressants, MindSoothe Jr can take up to 6 weeks to reach its full therapeutic effect, although some children may respond sooner. Consistency of dosage and perseverance are therefore advised. 

Caution:
Never discontinue prescription medication without first consulting your doctor or a health care professional who is experienced in natural medicine. Do not use Mindsoothe Jr. together with other prescription anti-depressants. If your child is very fair in complexion, use a sun block if there is excessive exposure to sun as St John's Wort can sometimes increase the skin's sensitivity to sunburn.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: MindSoothe - Natural remedy & herbal mood tonic for depression & anxiety
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Natural Remedy Capsule
Price: 152.00

MindSoothe is a 100% herbal remedy, formulated by a Clinical Psychologist to  balance serotonin levels and relieve depression and anxiety. Taken regularly, MindSoothe works as a natural mood tonic, improving feelings of confidence and well-being. 

  • Improves mood and feelings of well-being
  • Helps with excessive tearfulness, irritability, stress or anger
  • Reduces symptoms of OCD, anxiety & panic attacks
  • Improves disturbed sleep patterns, energy levels and motivation
  • Helps with appetite disturbance (including anorexia, bulimia & comfort eating)
  • Prevents & treats Seasonal Affective Disorder (SAD) and PMS
  • Formulated by our Clinical Psychologist

Ingredients

MindSoothe contains the following therapeutic herbs in a 100% vegan friendly vege-capsule.

Hypericum perforatum (St John's Wort), Passiflora incarnata 

    Like all Feelgood Health products, MindSoothe contains no animal products, gluten, artificial flavours, colours or preservatives and is not tested on animals.

      Directions for use

      Adults: Initially take two capsules three times daily for 4 – 6 weeks. Thereafter take two capsules in the morning and two at night.
      Teenagers 16 - 18: One capsule in the morning and two at night.
      Teenagers 12 - 15: Initially take one capsule three times daily for 4 – 6 weeks. Thereafter take one capsule in the morning and one at night.

      Significant improvement should be noticed within 3 - 5 weeks, although some people respond much sooner.

      NOTE: For depression in children younger than 12 years old, please see our information on Mindsoothe Jr.

      We strongly recommend that our herbal PureCalm is taken together with Mindsoothe for maximum effectiveness against anxiety and depression - especially for people who are struggling with anxiety. PureCalm works quickly to calm you when you need it and also helps during the initial few weeks, while MindSoothe is beginning to take effect. 

      Caution: Safety in pregnancy has not yet been established. Do not take Mindsoothe together with other anti-depressants. If you suffer from high blood pressure, only use Mindsoothe under medical supervision. Do not stop any psychiatric medication without first consulting your prescribing doctor. 

       

      Note:
      Consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.

        Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Focus Formula: Natural help for concentration and ADHD
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Focus Formula is one of the flagship remedies of Feelgood Health. Formulated by their Clinical Psychologist, Focus Formula is a 100% herbal remedy with ingredients to promote brain health, concentration, memory and the ability to stay on task. Focus Formula is generally recommended along with BrightSpark (a homeopathic remedy to reduce hyperactivity and promote calmer behaviour)
  • Improves concentration, memory and attention span
  • Improves alertness and mental focus
  • Calms overactive minds, reduces impulsiveness and aggression
  • Improves grades and increases study efforts
  • Formulated by a Clinical Psychologist & safe for all ages

Ingredients

Focus Formula contains the following ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: ﻿

Ginkgo Biloba, Scuttellaria Laterifolia (also known as Skullcap), Matricaria Recutita (also known as German Chamomile), Centella Asiatica (also known as Gotu Cola) Avina Sativa (Green Oats), Urtica Urens (called Umbabazane in Africa), Aspalathus linearis (also known as Rooibos), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

Children up to the age of 15:
Take one drop per age year of the child in a little water or juice every morning and evening after meals.

Adults & Teenagers over 16:
15 - 20 drops in a little water or juice every morning and evening after meals.

Caution: Safety during pregnancy or breastfeeding has not yet been established. Focus is best used in combination with a healthy diet, regular exercise and fresh air.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Kali Phos Tissue Salt No.6 - Concentration & Tranquility (180 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 115.00

AllisOne's Kali Phosphate (180 tablets) is a tissue salt that supports the function of the heart and nervous system. It's a wonderful nerve tonic that promotes calmness, well-being and vitality, and assists brain power.

  • Excellent nervous system tonic for pets and humans alike
  • Relieves exhaustion, irritability & stress
  • Assists concentration, memory and age related memory-loss
  • Eases bad breath or body odour
  • Lactose & sugar-free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, animals and babies)

Ingredients

Kali Phos D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Triple Complex Brain Tonic - Tissue salts for better brain health & balance
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 121.50

Triple Complex Brain Tonic combines bio-chemic tissue salts chosen to support brain health. It can benefit all people, especially children with learning disabilities or ADHD, as well as teens and adults who are in need of a boost in mental clarity while undergoing stress like exams or challenging work pressures.

  • Natural brain tonic for students of all ages
  • Helps the brain cope during times of stress
  • Improves nutrition & oxygen flow to the brain
  • Assists with concentration & memory (reduces forgetfulness)
  • Helps in the natural treatment of ADHD, ADD & learning disorders
  • Safe for all ages and during pregnancy

Ingredients

Triple Complex Brain Tonic contains the following selected biochemic tissue salts:

Kali phos (D6), Nat mur (D6), Calc phos (D6), Lactose (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    Triple Complex Brain Tonic can be used as a daily supplement in its own right, or as an adjunct to enhance the benefits of natural medicines for various conditions. It comes in small sucking tablets which are placed under the tongue to dissolve.

    Dosage:
    6 years and older: As a regular supplement, dissolve 2 tablets under the tongue or chew in the mouth three times daily. During times of stress, the frequency of dosage can be increased to five or six times daily.

    Age 1 - 6 years: One tablet three times daily (may be crushed into a powder and sprinkled in the mouth)  

    Note: Because tissue salts improve cellular functioning and assist with absorption, they are frequently recommended as companion remedies to other natural medicines.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: Feelgood Health Triple Complex Brain Health

entry.title: BrightSpark: Natural ADHD remedy for hyperactivity & behavioural problems
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Homeopathic Remedy Tablets
Price: 121.50

This homeopathic remedy has been formulated by a Clinical Psychologist to assist with hyperactivity and behavioural problems in children with ADHD. It is typically used together with Feelgood Health's Focus Formula.

  • Safe & non-addictive natural remedy for hyperactivity,  ADHD and learning problems
  • Reduces restlessness, fidgeting, squirming & impulsive behaviour
  • Reduces the need to constantly 'play the fool' & disrupt the class
  • Encourages a more co-operative manner & improves the ability to concentrate & stay on task
  • Reduces tics (Tourette's Syndrome)
  • 125 tablets per bottle

Ingredients

Hyoscyamus (30C),  Tuberculinum (30C), Arsen iod (30C), Verat alb (30C), Lactose (inactive ingredient)

Directions

On the first day, dissolve 1 tablet in a clean mouth every hour for 6 hours (best to start on a weekend or during the holidays). Thereafter dissolve 2 tablets in the mouth 3 times daily. The second dosage can be taken at 3pm or 4pm for those children that are in school.

Once hyperactivity and behaviour has improved, dosage may be reduced to twice or even once a day. 

Note: Although it is very effective in its own right, BrightSpark for hyperactivity has been formulated for use along with Focus Formula, a herbal remedy for ADHD to support brain health, improved concentration and mental clarity. It is highly recommended that these two remedies for ADHD be used together for best results. 

Note:
Consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: BrainShine - Herbal Brain Tonic boosts memory & brain functioning
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Natural Remedy Capsule
Price: 167.50

Formulated by a Clinical Psychologist, BrainShine is a natural herbal remedy that boosts memory, concentration and cognitive functioning, while enhancing the ability to cope with stress. 
  • Ideal for business executives, students, stressed individuals & those with age-related memory problems
  • Boosts brain health and functioning & gives you a mental 'edge'
  • Increases mental alertness, concentration and the ability to stay focused
  • Improves memory and reduces forgetfulness and 'brain fog'
  • Improves the ability to cope under pressure
  • Makes it easier to multi-task without losing performance
  • Assists with Adult ADHD

Ingredients

Centella asiatica (Gotu Cola), Rosmarinus officinalis, Panax ginseng in a vegan-friendly capsule

Like all Feelgood Health products, BrainShine contains no animal products, gluten, artificial flavours, colours or preservatives and is not tested on animals.

    Directions for use

    Adults and teenagers over 16: Take two capsules twice a day. 
    Teenagers 12 - 15:  Take one capsule twice a day.

    Note: As the ingredients in BrainShine encourage mental alertness, this remedy is best taken at least 4 hours before going to sleep. 

    Caution: Safety during pregnancy & breastfeeding has not been established. Keep this, and all medicines, out of reach of children. 

    Note:
    Consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Triple Complex Nerve Tonic. Tissue salts for nervous system health
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 121.50

Triple Complex Nerve Tonic combines bio-chemic tissue salts chosen to support the nervous system. It can benefit all people, but is especially good as a supplement for children and adults with chronic or acute anxiety or nervous system problems.

  • Reduces anxiety and panic attacks
  • Soothes anxiety levels
  • Promotes calmed nerves
  • Promotes health of the entire nervous system
  • Safe for all ages and during pregnancy and breastfeeding
  • Formulated by a Clinical Psychologist

Ingredients

Triple Complex Nerve Tonic contains the following selected biochemic tissue salts:

Ferrum phos (D6), Kali phos (D6), Mag phos (D6), Lactose (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    Triple Complex Nerve Tonic can be used as a daily supplement in its own right, or as an adjunct to enhance the benefits of natural medicines for various conditions. It comes in small sucking tablets which are placed under the tongue to dissolve.

    Dosage:

    6 years and older: As a regular supplement, dissolve 2 - 4 tablets under the tongue or chew in the mouth three times daily. During times of acute distress, the frequency of dosage can be increased to every 10 minutes if necessary.

    Age 1 - 6 years: One tablet three times daily (may be crushed into a powder and sprinkled in the mouth). Frequency of dosage may be increased as above. 

    Note: Because tissue salts improve cellular functioning and assist with absorption, they are frequently recommended as companion remedies to other natural medicines, such as Feelgood Health MindSoothe and PureCalm.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: Feelgood Health Triple Complex Nerve Tonic
